scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend-rust && cargo run" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.test: npm test --prefix frontend && cd backend-rust && cargo test
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && cd backend-rust && cargo clippy
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend && cd backend-rust && cargo fmt
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix frontend && cd backend-rust && cargo fmt
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix frontend && cd backend-rust && cargo fmt --check
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend-rust && cargo run" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
